profile:
Canark Paving started with humble beginnings. Chris, at a young age, started his company with only himself as the sole employee knocking door to door selling driveway sealing service. Over time, Canark Paving has become the biggest provider of driveway sealing in the city with 5 employees. The company started to grow and inevitably, working with asphalt is the next step. Canark Paving did driveway cut-outs, repairing only parts of the driveway that were visibly damaged. They did mostly small paving repair jobs such as pothole repairs, commercial parking lot repairs, and asphalt ramps. Meanwhile, Canark Paving also had interlock projects on the interim. Fast forward to 2020, Canark Paving has grown with 20 employees running the sealing, interlock, and paving divisions. It has become a trusted paving company in Ottawa by focusing on customer experience and high-quality workmanship. We are proud to be the highest rated paving company in Ottawa as well as being accredited with the Better Business Bureau (BBB), Yellowpages, Homestars and Google My Business verified. We know how important it is for our customers to choose an honest and reliable company which is why we ensure that we are a verified paving company.
Canark Paving provides quality service from the beginning to the end. From the moment you speak to our customer service agent, to our salespeople and our project managers- we are there for you every step of the way. We do residential and commercial paving work. We strive for excellence and focus on customer satisfaction. We provide paving work in Ottawa as well as the surrounding towns including Carp, Kanata, Orleans, Embrun, Russell, Metcalfe, Osgoode, Manotick, and Greely. Canark Paving is a company that genuinely cares about their employees, the environment, and especially our customers.
services:
Ottawa Paving, 
Commercial Paving

Driveway Sealing

Interlock Brick Installation

Black Tar Construction is an Ottawa-based company that offers Asphalt Paving, Interlocking, and Foundation Repair services.

Black Tar Construction was founded in 2013 with the goal of offering outstanding customer service for our customers and a great work environment for our employees. 
The growth of Black Tar has been achieved through exceeding customer expectations year after year. 
The customer is a priority every step of the way. Our commitment to quality has allowed us to foster closer relationships with our customers, suppliers, and staff.

As of 2022, we are a team of over 50 strong, with over 11,500 projects completed successfully in the past 10 years!

profile: Seal-A-Drive is a family owned and operated business that was established in 1990. We are a complete asphalt maintenance company that offers services to commercial and residential customers. Sealadrive was originally started in the Orillia and Barrie area. With Seal-A-Drives success, we have grown and expanded family locations too Ottawa and North Bay. Our aim is to handle all your asphalt care needs with a professional owner-customer based approach providing top quality workmanship. Owner operated hands-on work is what we feel sets us apart from the competition. We take pride in our work and are involved through out the entire process, making sure it is done right the first time. We have a reputation for unmatched professionalism and top quality service. Serving all of Ottawa.
